data.expected_result: The alt or account will join right back in to the call (if the call is still active)
data.short_description: “Join the call” does not work once a user has left the call and wants to rejoin
data.steps_to_repro: - Get a alt, and get it to call your main/other account - Answer the call on your main/other account - Disconnect the alt account, and you will see a text saying “<Your alt name> started a call. Join the Call”- click “Join the Call”
